security: Revealing that XPORTELA contacted AMLASH-1 and APMWHIP-1 on behalf of WAVE could expose sources and methods used to gather intelligence on Cuban activities, potentially jeopardizing ongoing or future operations. Quoting directly: 'XPORTELA States Jeweler who CONTACTED Him MIAMI Hotel EARLY FALL 64 BEHALF AMLASH-1 AND APMWHIP-I.'
summary: A message indicating concurrence with action para 3 of WAVE 7531, referencing XPORTELA's contact with AMLASH-1 and APMWHIP-1 in Miami on behalf of WAVE.
summary_one_paragraph: This message form, dated January 27, 1965, indicates that JMHAVE Paris concurs with action paragraph 3 of WAVE 7531. The message highlights that XPORTELA, identified as a jeweler, contacted AMLASH-1 and APMWHIP-1 in a Miami hotel in the early fall of 1964 on behalf of WAVE.
title: AMLASH MHAPRON ANGABE
